message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to pay that amount for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $110.
